attributes.action: call for a return to What Really Matters in life. We want values based governance to underpin all economic, financial and government systems, organisations and institutions across the globe so that we achieve a landscape where corporations, governments and financial systems serve and benefit us and our communities globally and the natural world, rather than plundering all
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the recession and credit crunch have created suffering and hardship for thousands whilst those who have been operating a non values based system within the economic and financial markets have benefitted. We call for a system that adds real value to the economy and our communities and not paper based profit, and where organisations serve people and sustainability nationally and globally rather than people serving organisations.
